Public Class XamlMember Implements IEquatable(Of XamlMember)

summary.span: 为 XAML 类型的成员提供 XAML 类型系统标识符。

span.span: Provides the XAML type system identifier for members of XAML types.

summary.span: 该标识符由 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器在处理成员节点的过程中使用（如果 XAML 读取器位于 上），另外还用于常规 XAML 类型系统逻辑。

span.span: The identifier is used by XAML readers and XAML writers during processing of member nodes (when the XAML reader is positioned on a ) and also for general XAML type system logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用三种方法用于返回有关 XAML 成员的信息： 标准公共语言运行时 (CLR) 反射;调用内部的仅限引用的反射技术 Api 的使用进行了优化位标志;或调用虚拟的重写`Lookup*`可能提供的 API子类。 can use three methodologies for returning information about a XAML member: standard common language runtime (CLR) reflection; a reference-only reflection technique calling internal APIs that use optimized bit flags; or calling into virtual overrides of the `Lookup*` API that is provided by possible subclasses. 大部分使用.NET Framework XAML 服务 Api 和API，你将使用默认 XAML 架构上下文。For most uses of .NET Framework XAML Services APIs and the API, you use the default XAML schema context. .NET Framework XAML 服务的默认 XAML 架构上下文使用 CLR 类型系统的支持。The default XAML schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services uses CLR backing for the type system. 这样，若要使用任何类型或成员定义中，或其他可用于、 CLR 和其反射技术的 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器。This enables the XAML readers and XAML writers to work with any type or member that is defined in, or otherwise available to, the CLR and its reflection techniques. ## 查找 \* Api 和 XamlMember 派生类Lookup\* APIs and XamlMember Derived Classes 定义了多个派生类的虚拟成员可能会重写。 defines several virtual members that derived classes might override. 这些成员的名称的字符串始终开头`Lookup`。These members have names that always start with the string `Lookup`. 该 API 的其余部分命名然后引用的虚拟方法影响的属性。The remainder of the API name then references the property that the virtual method influences. 例如，派生的类可能会替代若要影响哪些基本定义的属性返回派生类中。For example, a derived class might override to influence what the base-defined property returns in a derived class. 您可以预测中的此类属性的返回值或现有的派生类通过阅读相关的文档`Lookup*`方法。You can predict return values for such properties in or existing derived classes by reading the documentation for the relevant `Lookup*` methods. 目的`Lookup*`方法是提供 XAML 类型系统扩展的技术，其中包含基类。The purpose of the `Lookup*` methods is to provide a XAML type system extension technique that incorporates the base class. 通过派生自并重写`Lookup`虚拟成员，您可以定义的 XAML 成员的 XAML 架构的概念 XAML 类型系统中而不受限于后备类型系统或技术的详细信息。By deriving from and overriding the `Lookup` virtual members, you can define the concept of a XAML member for a XAML schema in a XAML type system without being tied to the specifics of a backing type system or technology. 可以使用这种方案下提供的 XAML 架构上下文和仍将返回所需的结果。You can also use a provided XAML schema context under this scheme and still return the results you want. 例如，考虑属性。As an example, consider the property . 此属性会通知调用方的操作，例如使用的序列化可以将一个值写入此成员上的目标对象。This property informs callers that operations such as using a for serialization can write a value for this member on a target object. 在默认实现中，通过使用反射技术的后备 CLR 对进行的该成员是否可写确定及其成员 ( )。In the default implementation, the determination of whether the member is writable is made by using reflection techniques against the backing CLR and its members (the ). 因此，默认情况下，XAML 类型系统依赖于 CLR 类型系统。Therefore, by default, the XAML type system depends on the CLR type system. 但是，可以为你 XAML 类型系统的报表的删除此依赖项通过重写 API 。However, you can remove this dependency for your XAML type system reporting of by overriding the API . 在重写中，可以使用其他判断，如特定于你的技术，适用于固定的 XAML 词汇或各种其他策略用于确定是否 XAML 成员是在可写的主查找表的元数据应用XAML 词汇。Within your override, you can use other determinations, such as metadata that is specific to your technology, a master lookup table that is optimized for a fixed XAML vocabulary, or a variety of other strategies for determining whether a XAML member is writable in your XAML vocabulary. ## 构造 XamlMember 而无需 XAML 架构上下文Constructing XamlMember Without XAML Schema Context 大多数构造函数需要作为其初始化的一部分。Most constructors of require a as part of their initialization. 还有很多内部必要操作，例如获取转发从后备类型的信息。The is also necessary for many internal operations, such as obtaining information that is being forwarded from the backing type. 当您在处理API，则通常会有如也是可从周边构造。When you are working with the API, you typically have a that is available from a surrounding construct such as a . 在这种情况下，您可以将传递引用通过为所有需要 XAML 架构上下文的 XAML 类型系统调用。In this case, you can pass the reference through to all XAML type system calls that require a XAML schema context. 一个特定的构造函数， ，不需要。One specific constructor, , does not require a . 但是，构造签名返回`true`为。However, a that is constructed with the signature returns `true` for . 涉及到了加载路径，此类成员不能写入对象图。For a load path that involves , such a member cannot be written into an object graph. 使用.NET Framework XAML 服务实现中，调用将引发时的相关报表`true`为。Using the .NET Framework XAML services implementation, the call throws a when the relevant reports `true` for . 不应构造具有值`true`有关除非您的实现可以处理从异常，或有其他方法来调整行为。You should not construct a that has a value of `true` for unless your implementation can handle the exceptions from , or you have other ways to adjust the behavior. 例如，一个或多个以下可能的实现，则返回 true:For example, one or more of the following might be true of your implementation: - XAML 架构上下文是更高版本可用。The XAML schema context is available later. - 使用成员调用程序模式。You use a member invoker pattern. - 谨慎地重写中自定义 XAML 编写器。You deliberately override in a custom XAML writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值通常设置在初始化期间，通常不是`null`。This value is typically set during initialization and is usually not `null`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 信息可以传入由构造函数进行初始化。 information can be passed in by constructors for initialization. 通过直接调用基类构造函数，初始化派生的类可以省略某些值检查的基类中所做的。By calling directly into base constructors, initialization for derived classes can omit some of the value-checks that are made in the base class. 因此，派生的初始化可以更改 XAML 成员的报告的类型成员关系信息，以便它不再按预期的方式与其基础 CLR 声明的类型系统信息一致。Therefore, the derived initialization can change the reported type-member relationship information of a XAML member so that it no longer aligns in an expected way with the type system information of its underlying CLR declaration. 对于声明的类型信息的任何安全关键检查，请改为使用的基础 CLR 类型。For any security-critical checks of declaring type information, use the underlying CLR type instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用调用或该方法的特定重写。Calling invokes or a specific override of that method. 在其中的初始内部反射逻辑还未设置信息的情况下会发生此行为。This behavior occurs in cases where the initial internal reflection logic has not already set the information. `DependsOn`可以应用于有意与常规的 XAML 规则相矛盾的对象模型事例的模式。The `DependsOn` pattern can be applied to object model cases that deliberately contradict a general XAML rule. 一般的 XAML 规则是不会传递以初始化文本 （或通过在 XAML 2009 中的工厂方法） 类型的成员必须能够以任意顺序指定。The general XAML rule is that members of a type that are not passed as initialization text (or by a factory method in XAML 2009) must be able to be assigned in any order. 通过应用`DependsOn`模式为成员，您可以指示 XAML 编写器始终处理之前此成员引用的成员。By applying a `DependsOn` pattern to a member, you can instruct XAML writers to always process the referenced member before this member. 您可以应用在其中的当前成员的值需要上下文或其他成员设置后才可用的其他信息的情况下此模式。You can apply this pattern in situations where the value of the current member requires context or other information that is only available after the other member is set. `DependsOn`应谨慎应用和它所服务体系结构的用途的属性方案为保留模式。The `DependsOn` pattern should be applied judiciously and reserved for property scenarios where it serves an architectural purpose. 大量的依赖项也可能会减慢 XAML 处理。Large numbers of dependencies have the potential to slow down XAML processing. 此外，就可以产生循环依赖关系，在这种情况下的 XAML 处理行为是不确定。Also, it is possible to produce circular dependencies, in which case the XAML processing behavior is undefined. 示例`DependsOn`从 WPF 的方案包括某些属性上并，然后在，然后在。Example `DependsOn` scenarios from WPF include certain properties on and , on , and on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终在构造过程中设置此值。This value is always set during construction. 由实现的构造函数通常将引发异常如果未指定初始名称; 因此，不希望此属性才能为`null`或空字符串，如果使用默认.NET Framework XAML 服务实现。The constructors that are implemented by typically throw an exception if an initial name is not specified; therefore, do not expect this property to be `null` or an empty string, if you are using default .NET Framework XAML Services implementations. [XamlName 语法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)和 CLR 类型和成员的命名规则不是精确相交。[XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md) and naming rules for CLR type and members are not an exact intersect. 它是可以声明的成员名称是在 CLR 合法的但 XAML 命名下无效。It is possible to declare a member name that is legal under CLR but not valid under XAML naming. 应尽可能避免这种情况。You should avoid this situation if possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值是不同的可附加和非可附加成员。The returned value is different for attachable and non-attachable members. 为非可附加成员返回。For non-attachable members, returns . 为可附加成员返回基于此逻辑的结果：For attachable members, returns a result that is based on this logic: - 如果反射不能解析支持 ( `true`)，此方法返回一个内部常量，用于表示泛型对象类型。If reflection cannot resolve a backing ( `true`), this method returns an internal constant that represents a generic object type. - 如果前面所有条件不都适用，调用。If the previous condition does not apply, is called. 默认实现返回检查实现的方法基于`get`和`set`访问器。The default implementation returns a that is based on examining the methods that implement the `get` and `set` accessors. 类可能会替代若要使用不同的行为，如其他元数据窗体，可能会报告的目标类型为可附加成员。A class might override to use a different behavior such as other metadata forms that might report target types for attachable members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用调用或该方法的特定重写。Calling invokes or a specific override of that method. 当初始内部反射逻辑还未设置信息时，将发生这种情况。This occurs when the initial internal reflection logic has not already set the information. 中的默认行为 (无重写)，返回可以具有不同概念的含义。In the default behavior (no override), the returned can have different conceptual meanings. 适用的含义取决于是否这表示属性、 方法或事件，如以下列表所示：Which meaning applies depends on whether this represents a property, method, or event, as the following list shows: - 对于属性，返回是设置的属性或属性返回的类型。For a property, the returned is the type that sets the property or is returned by the property. - 返回的事件是必需的事件处理程序类型 （CLR 实现中的委托）。For an event, the returned is the required event handler type (a delegate in a CLR implementation). - 对于方法，请是该方法中，这可能是返回类型`null`。For a method, is the return type of that method, which may be `null`. 在每种情况下，XAML 架构上下文用于评估从后备类型的 XAML 类型。In each case, the XAML schema context is used to evaluate the XAML type from the backing type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用调用或该方法的特定重写。Calling invokes or a specific override of that method. 初始内部反射逻辑还未设置信息时，会发生此行为。This behavior occurs when the initial internal reflection logic has not already set the information. 实现返回非 null 属性值不一定是一个有效的。Implementations that return a non-null property value for are not necessarily a working . 以下是可能的非 null 返回值的列表以及这些值表示的含义：The following is a list of possible non-null return values for and what these values represent: - 返回值报告具有特定于该成员或更普遍的情况为转换器的目标类型的特性的类型转换器。The return value reports a type converter that is attributed specifically to that member or more generally to the target type of the converter. 此行为通常是哪些大多数的 XAML 类型系统和 XAML 处理器所查找的以便实例化的类型转换器，并调用其方法。This behavior is typically what most XAML type systems and XAML processors look for in order to instantiate a type converter and invoke its methods. - 返回值将报告内置值转换器。The return value reports a built-in value converter. 这些转换器存在由 XAML 编写器执行某些内部操作。These converters exist for certain internal operations that are performed by a XAML writer. 具体而言，这些内置值转换器将原始属性字符串值转换为 XAML 语言级别基元。In particular, these built-in value converters convert the raw attribute string values to the XAML language-level primitives. 有关.NET Framework XAML 服务实现中，这些内置类型转换通常将转发到系统程序集中定义的类型转换器。For the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, these built-in type conversions often forward to a type converter that is defined in the System assembly. 转换值具有内置转发转换，因此值引用。For example, a conversion for an value has built-in forwarded conversion, and therefore, the value references . - 返回值将报告一个不受约束的对象模型; 的特殊情况下即已的值。The return value reports the special case of an unconstrained object model; that is, the has a value of . 在这种情况下，报告是 {`Object}`。In this case, the reports that the is {`Object}`. 但是，是`null`因为没有实际类型或实例是可用于执行此转换。However, is `null` because no actual type or instance is available to perform this conversion. 相反，不能直到运行时，当特定技术的运行时确定其对象图处理在确定对象模型行为。Instead, the object model behavior cannot be determined until run time, when the runtime of the specific technology determines the handling of its object graph. 如果可以访问一个有效从，可以调用它的转换方法。If you can access a working from , you can invoke its conversion methods. 但是，许多转换方法都依赖于服务上下文。However, many conversion methods rely on service context. 如果没有可用的类型转换器需要为其编写对象的对象图的典型的角色相同的服务上下文，转换器方法可以引发异常。If you do not have the same service context available that the type converter expects for its typical role of writing objects for object graphs, the converter methods can throw exceptions.
